com.smartnsoft.droid4me.log

Class Log4JLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.log.Log4JLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Logger

    public class Log4JLogger
extends java.lang.Object
implements Logger
    The logger implementation for Log4J, which works with the "android-logging-log4j" library.

    When using this implementation (see LoggerFactory.LoggerConfigurator), the classpath should have log4j.jar and -logging-log4j.jar libraries.

    Since:
    2013.04.18
    Author:
    Ã‰douard Mercier
    See Also:
    LoggerFactory
